MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD5 postcode area of Kelso, affecting properties in Old Graden Farm and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:15pm due to a fault on our overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:53pm on Wednesday, 10 February 2021
